events.message: The insured reported a collision involving their car and another vehicle at a busy intersection on April 30th.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords detected in the initial report mentioning car collision.
An agent specializing in vehicle accident claims has been assigned to handle this case and contact the insured promptly.
The insured was officially notified that their auto accident claim was received and is now under review by our team.
Request sent for police report, photographs of vehicle damage, and driver’s license copies to support the auto accident claim.
The insured submitted all requested documents including detailed photos of the damaged car and official accident report.
Investigation initiated to verify the circumstances of the collision and assess liability and extent of vehicle damage.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of collision details, fault assessment, and estimated repair costs for the vehicle.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the damage assessment and claim policy coverage for the insured vehicle.
The insured acknowledged receipt of settlement offer and provided feedback requesting clarification of payment details.
Claim has been approved by the claims manager following the insured’s acceptance of the proposed settlement terms.
Payment for the approved claim amount has been processed and transferred to the insured’s designated bank account.
The auto accident claim is officially closed after successful settlement payment and confirmation from the insured.
All case files and documents related to this auto accident claim have been archived for future reference and auditing.
